name: PERSONAL NUTRITION PLAN
description: Knowing where to start is a challenge if you're a new exerciser or trying to get back into exercise. The best workout schedule for you will depend on various factors like your age, fitness level, goals, and any physical restrictions you may have.

name: WEIGHT LOSS CHALLENGES
description: If you are dedicated to losing fat then we are ready with a challenge for you. Follow it without a cheat sheet and lose that fat!

name: LIFESTYLE SUPERVISION
description: Activity monitoring of a person for a long-term would be helpful for controlling lifestyle associated diseases. Such diseases are often linked with the way a person lives. An unhealthy and irregular standard of living influences the risk of such diseases in the later part of one's life.

name: PERSONAL TRAINING
description: I can give you the tools and support that you need to reach a health and fitness goal. I can provide support, accountability, education, and a personalized plan of attack, so you may find working with one well worth the investment.

name: FREEHAND AND YOGA TRAINING
description: We live in times when our lifestyle has become extremely hectic. The workloads are extremely heavy which leads to a 24X7 work schedule for many. As a result, we are left with little time for any kind of physical exercise.  Thus we are compelled to lead a sedentary lifestyle and fall prey to many lifestyle diseases.
